Phrase_Generator

Class Generator

  • java.lang.Object
    • Phrase_Generator.Generator
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    DurationsGenerator, HomophonyConstructor, PhraseGenerator, PitchGenerator

    public abstract class Generator
extends java.lang.Object
    An abstract class that provides methods for use in music generation using GTTM style musical grammars

    • Method Detail

      • durationToBeat

        protected int durationToBeat(DurationEnum duration)
        Returns an int indicating how many beats a given DurationEnum spans
        Parameters:
        duration - the DurationEnum to assess the span distance
        Returns:
        the amount of beats spanned after the instantiation of the duration, not including its original instantiation beat

      • assignFieldVariables

        protected void assignFieldVariables(GrammarContainer grammar)
        Used to assign the GrammarContainer elements to the fields of the Generator
        Parameters:
        grammar - the GrammarContainer to be added to the generator
